languages.text: "Сколько же красных всполохов вырвалось из твоего сердца, Ирлиэт". {n}Взгляд Кассии полон жалости к эльдарке.{/n} "У меня не было намерений вредить тебе и твоим собратьям. Но если ты жаждешь моей смерти — без боя я не подставлю свою шею под меч".

traits.locale_text: "Сколько же красных всполохов вырвалось из твоего сердца, Ирлиэт". {n}Взгляд Кассии полон жалости к эльдарке.{/n} "У меня не было намерений вредить тебе и твоим собратьям. Но если ты жаждешь моей смерти — без боя я не подставлю свою шею под меч".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."
languages.original_text: "Сколько же красных всполохов вырвалось из твоего сердца, Ирлиэт". {n}Взгляд Кассии полон жалости к эльдарке.{/n} "У меня не было намерений вредить тебе и твоим собратьям. Но если ты жаждешь моей смерти — без боя я не подставлю свою шею под меч".

traits.locale_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never wanted to harm you or your brethren. But if it is my death you desire, I shall not offer you my neck without a fight."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never wanted to harm you or your brethren. But if it is my death you desire, I shall not offer you my neck without a fight."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your brethren. But if it is my death you desire, I shan't go down without a fight."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your brethren. But if it is my death you desire, I shan't go down without a fight."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ユリエット、数多の赤い炎があなたの心から吹き出しています」{n}カシアの憐れみに満ちた視線がアエルダリに注がれる。{/n}「あたくしはあなたも、あなたの同胞も傷つけません。ですが、あたくしの死を望むというなら、戦わずして折れるつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、数多の赤い炎があなたの心から吹き出しています」{n}カシアの憐れみに満ちた視線がアエルダリに注がれる。{/n}「あたくしはあなたも、あなたの同胞も傷つけません。ですが、あたくしの死を望むというなら、戦わずして折れるつもりはありません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的心中迸发出无数炽红色的火焰，伊莉耶特。”{n}卡西娅的目光充满了对她的同情。{/n}“我从来没打算伤害你或你的族人，但如果你打算要我的命，我也不会乖乖任人宰割。”
languages.original_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."

traits.locale_text: “你的心中迸发出无数炽红色的火焰，伊莉耶特。”{n}卡西娅的目光充满了对她的同情。{/n}“我从来没打算伤害你或你的族人，但如果你打算要我的命，我也不会乖乖任人宰割。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Votre cœur est entouré de tant de flammes rouges, Yrliet... » {n}Le regard de Cassia est plein de compassion pour l'Aeldari.{/n} « Je ne vous ai jamais voulu le moindre mal, à vous ou à vos semblables. Mais si c'est ma mort que vous souhaitez, sachez que je n'ai aucune intention de me laisser faire. »
languages.original_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."

traits.locale_text: « Votre cœur est entouré de tant de flammes rouges, Yrliet... » {n}Le regard de Cassia est plein de compassion pour l'Aeldari.{/n} « Je ne vous ai jamais voulu le moindre mal, à vous ou à vos semblables. Mais si c'est ma mort que vous souhaitez, sachez que je n'ai aucune intention de me laisser faire. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Una multitud de llamas rojas acaban de brotar de tu corazón, Yrliet». {n}La mirada de Cassia está cargada de simpatía por la Aeldari.{/n} «Nunca tuve intención de heriros a ti ni a los tuyos. Si es mi muerte lo que deseas, no obstante, no me rendiré sin pelear».
languages.original_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."

traits.locale_text: «Una multitud de llamas rojas acaban de brotar de tu corazón, Yrliet». {n}La mirada de Cassia está cargada de simpatía por la Aeldari.{/n} «Nunca tuve intención de heriros a ti ni a los tuyos. Si es mi muerte lo que deseas, no obstante, no me rendiré sin pelear».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "So viele rote Flammen sind gerade aus Eurem Herzen geschossen, Yrliet." {n}Cassias Blick ist voller Mitgefühl für die Aeldari.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch und Euren Verwandten nie Schaden zufügen. Doch wenn Ihr meinen Tod begehrt, werde ich mich nicht kampflos ergeben."
languages.original_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."

traits.locale_text: "So viele rote Flammen sind gerade aus Eurem Herzen geschossen, Yrliet." {n}Cassias Blick ist voller Mitgefühl für die Aeldari.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch und Eurem Volk nie Schaden zufügen. Doch wenn Ihr meinen Tod begehrt, werde ich mich nicht kampflos ergeben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kalbinden bir anda o kadar çok kırmızı alev çıktı ki Yrliet." {n}Cassia, Aeldari'ye sempati dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Asla sana veya soydaşlarına zarar vermeye niyetim yoktu. Fakat ölümümün peşindeysen öylece teslim olacak değilim."
languages.original_text: "So many red flames have just burst from your heart, Yrliet." {n}Cassia's gaze is full of sympathy for the Aeldari.{/n} "I never meant to harm you or your kin. But if it is my death you desire, I will not go down without a fight."

traits.locale_text: "Kalbinden bir anda o kadar çok kırmızı alev çıktı ki Yrliet." {n}Cassia'nın bakışı, Aeldariler için sempati dolu.{/n} "Asla sana veya soydaşlarına zarar vermeye niyetim yoktu. Lakin eğer ölümümün peşindeysen, öylece teslim olacak değilim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
